FlowRecordElementOccurrence.name: FlowRecordElementOccurrence
FlowRecordElementOccurrence.description: Represents the execution metrics for a single element within a flow version.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency associated with the flow.

Entries.description: The number of times the element was initiated in all flow interviews after the flow version was executed.

Errors.description: The number of errors for the element in all flow interviews after the flow version was executed.

Exits.description: The number of times the element was executed to completion in all flow interviews after the flow version was executed.

FlowRecordElementId.description: The ID of the flow element.

FlowRecordVersionId.description: The ID of the flow version.

FlowRecordVersionOccurrenceId.description: The ID of the flow occurrence.

Name.description: The API name of the flow element.

Stopped.description: The number of times execution of the element was stopped in all flow interviews after the flow version was executed.

TotalDuration.description: The total time in milliseconds spent executing the element in all flow interviews.
